seller_description: Lysol All-Purpose Cleaner effectively eliminates 99.9% of viruses and bacteria, including the COVID-19 virus (SARS-CoV-2) on hard, non-porous surfaces in just 2 minutes (EPA Reg 777-66). This disinfecting spray not only provides a deep clean by eliminating germs, removing soap scum, and cutting through tough grease and grime but also deodorizes with a refreshing tropical Mango and Hibiscus scent. Versatile and convenient, it can be used on multiple hard surfaces throughout the home, including the kitchen and bathroom. As a trusted leader in disinfection, Lysol offers a range of great products, including disinfecting wipes, sprays, and all-purpose cleaners, for all your cleaning needs.
review: Lysol All-Purpose Cleaner is the perfect combination of effectiveness and delightful freshness! This tropical Mango and Hibiscus-scented cleaner not only eliminates 99.9% of viruses and bacteria, including COVID-19, but also transforms your cleaning routine with its invigorating aroma. Whether it’s cutting through tough grease, removing soap scum, or just ensuring a germ-free environment, this cleaner handles every task effortlessly. Its vibrant design and powerful performance make it more than just a cleaner—it’s a must-have for maintaining a healthy, sparkling home!
Expected_output: The seller highlights Lysol All-Purpose Cleaner as a highly effective product that eliminates 99.9% of viruses and bacteria, including the COVID-19 virus, within two minutes on hard, non-porous surfaces. The product is marketed as versatile, capable of tackling soap scum, grease, and grime while leaving a refreshing Mango and Hibiscus scent. The seller’s images reinforce these features with a vibrant, clearly labeled bottle emphasizing its disinfecting power and tropical fragrance. The buyer’s image confirms receipt of the advertised product, showing an identical bottle with the same design, branding, and features as highlighted by the seller. The packaging is in excellent condition, with no discrepancies observed between the seller’s claims and the product received. While the buyer’s feedback on performance is absent, the alignment of the delivered product with the seller’s description and visuals indicates a reliable and accurate transaction. In conclusion, the product fully meets its advertised promises, and the seller has delivered as expected, ensuring a positive and satisfactory experience for the buyer. The cleaner’s functionality, combined with its vibrant presentation, makes it a dependable choice for maintaining cleanliness and freshness.
label: -1: buyers opinion
